prefixIntro.title: T 开头核心词
prefixIntro.description: 高中阶段 T 开头的高频混合词汇。
prefixIntro.imagery: 字母 T 像一棵树（Tree）或支撑物，常含“接触（Touch）、延伸、支撑”之意。

words.imagery: 一张带有条目的税单或发票。

sentences.en: The government may impose tariffs on imports.
sentences.cn: 政府可能会对进口商品征收关税。

sentences.en: The death toll has risen to 83.

sentences.en: You might have it towed away by the police.
sentences.cn: 你可能会被警察把车拖走。

sentences.en: She gave his sleeve a tug.
